result.execSummary:
The defendant Kohl A Baker was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Concurrent with: any sentence currently being served

miscConds.notes: Fulltime work/fulltime school and when not fully engaged must complete 15 hours community service per week.

Counseling as recommended.
DNA sample w/ surcharge.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Case called: 3:16 pm
INCLUDES 15CM1740, 15CM2137, 15TR3989.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Molly Lawrence:
Defendant appears in person and with Atty Sharon Gisselman;
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to:
15CM2137:
Ct. 1 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia)>>DRI.
Ct. 3 (BJ)>>DRI.

15TR3989:
Ct. 1 (Exceeding Speed Zones, etc. (16-19 MPH))>>DISMISS OUTRIGHT.

COURT GRANTS ABOVE.

PLEA: 
15CM1740:
Ct. 1 (Possession of THC)>> NO CONTEST.

15CM2137:
Ct. 2 (Resisting or Obstructing an Officer)>> NO CONTEST.

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
15CM1740:
Ct. 1 (Possession of THC)>> Sentence W/H- 1 Year Probation, concurrent and concurrent to any sentence currently being served. CONDITIONS: Absolute sobriety from controlled substances, AODA and follow up, Counseling as recommended, Full time work/Full time school and when not fully engaged must complete 15 Hours Community Service per week, Court Costs including 1 DNA Sample and 1 Surcharge.

15CM2137:
Ct. 2 (Resisting or Obstructing an Officer)>> Sentence W/H- 1 Year Probation, concurrent and concurrent to any sentence currently being served. CONDITIONS: Absolute sobriety from controlled substances, AODA and follow up, Counseling as recommended, Full time work/Full time school and when not fully engaged must complete 15 Hours Community Service per week, Court Costs.

Adjourned: 3:28 pm

Pre-trial conference at 10-07-2015 01:50 pm.
Final pre-trial at 11-06-2015 09:00 am.
Jury Trial at 12-08-2015 09:00 am.
Absolute sobriety from controlled substances or unless valid prescription for medications.  No controlled substances without valid prescription and only in the amount prescribed.
